name: [WIP] Archer 2D
description:
You are an archer in training! Do your best to make a lot of points!

This game still under development and can drastically change! The actual features includes:

- Core mechanic
- Some target behaviour
- Recharge arrows

All the To dos, ideas and things that Im currently working on this game are available here: https://trello.com/b/VTMA4YWc/archer2d

All the ugly graphics are made by made and the pretty ones are made by NotSlot and are available here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-2d-hand-painted-18856...
